page.title: 19POPULATION SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: Rebecca and I went outside the library and stopped 10 people and asked them to answer 9 questions. When we got back to school all of the class put their results together and this is what we came up with:-56 people shopped in Freshwater, 8 did not.If not in Freshwater:-39 people went to Newport,3 to Yarmouth,3 to Totland,4 to Lymington,2 to Ryde,2 Southampton, 1 to Portsmouth,1 to Shanklin.Most people would like some bigger stores in Freshwater.14 people have lived herefor less than 5 years,and 30 people have lived here over 20 years.20 people shopped every day,43 didn't,23 would like more shops,34 wouldn't. 15 people were born on the Island,2 were born abroad,37 people were boen on the mainland.19 people did not like shopping in Freshwater,45 people did.
